links.name: countdown timer
links.description: This will be a fun one! Your challenge is to build this countdown timer. There are lots of small CSS tests in the design as well. So it should keep you busy!

links.name: stats preview
links.description: This is a great small challenge to help get you used to building to a design. There's no JS in this project, so you'll be able to focus on your HTML & CSS skills.

links.name: 3 Column Card Component
links.description: This challenge is perfect if you're just getting started. The shift between the layouts will be a nice test if you're new to building responsive projects.

links.name: FAQ component
links.description: In this challenge, you'll be building out an FAQ accordion. This is an extremely common front-end pattern, so it's a great opportunity to get some practice in!

links.name: profile component
links.description: This is a perfect challenge to test your layout skills. The card layout doesn't shift, so it's also great for those that haven't dived into responsive websites yet!

links.name: article preview
links.description: Practice your layout skills with this article preview component. There's lots of fun to be had playing around with animations for the sharing icons as well.

links.name: bootcamp testimonials
links.description: This challenge will be a nice test if you're new to JavaScript. It's also a great opportunity to play around with content animations and transitions.

links.name: signup form
links.description: Practice building out a sign-up form complete with client-side validation using JavaScript.

links.name: price component
links.description: In this challenge, you will build out the pricing component to the designs provided. This is perfect for beginners and people who want to complete a smaller challenge.
